__GOAL_AIMS__


>>>> Each GOAL is INDEPENDENT
>>>>  All the work to achieve one key aim : REVIEW, DEVELOPMENT, ANALYSIS, DISSEMINATION
>>>> Breakdown work into GOALS : INDEPENDENT DOMAINS of Project Objectives
>>>>    Consider DPAD Workflow : Develop > Process > Analyse > Disseminate
>>>>    GOALS capture DOMAINS of work 
>>>>    DELIVERABLES Capture a well-defined achievement in a domain 
>>>>    TASKS capture individual steps/iterations on a deliverable
>>>>
>>>>    REMEMBER : Each project note can be assigned MORE THAN ONE PROJECT GOAL > DELIVERABLE > TASK (GDT)
>>>>      This mechanism is the heart of how projectmaangr EFFICIENTLY MAPS WORK ACROSS MULTIPLE GOALS
>>>>      relevant work in each note can be effectively CROSS-REFERENCED to all relevant GDTs
>>>>
